position.marginalia_text: calidi & sicci, siccitate[m] disponit: natura[m] humida[m] in natura[m] suam (vt scitis) terminando.

marginalia.translation: [In such a way the strength] of hot and dry [fire] administers dryness by terminating the humid nature in dry nature, as you know.

position.marginalia_text: Putrefactio est corruptio substantia[e] rei, ex vaporu[m] retentione. si enim dispergatur per aera, no[n] putresit. Quare debet Aludel sic adaptari, ne respirare possit [etc]

marginalia.translation: Putrefaction is the corruption of a substance from the retention of vapours. For if it is dispersed through the air, it will not putrefy. Hence, the aludel has to be adjusted so that it does not admit any air at all.
